div.head: 金刃傷損
div.div: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as a] blade

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as a] blade

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jin chuang 金瘡 , wounds inflicted by metal objects. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xiang lu hu i 香爐灰：跌扑金刃傷損，罨之，止血生肌 , “Used to foment injuries obtained by falls and metal [objects, such as a] blade it will end the bleeding and generate muscle-flesh”.
